name: MedicalCostBurdenServiceRequests
title: Medical Cost Burden Service Requests
purpose: (Clinical Focus: <insert metadata> The value sets in this group represent the interventions associated with Medical Cost Burden as identified by the Gravity Project),(Data Element Scope: Supports the Gravity SDOH Clinical Care FHIR Implementation guide for the exchange of servicerequest.code),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes SNOMED CT and CPT interventions that have been identified through the Gravity Project community consensus voting process),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)
